production.name: Kitchen Sink
production.description: Snap a photo of your fridge and get instant recipe ideas. AI identifies your ingredients, rates your fridge out of 10, and roasts your food choices ‚Äî then suggests what to cook.
highlights: Claude vision API identifies ingredients from a single fridge photo
AI rates your fridge 1-10 on variety, nutrition, and cooking potential
Roast Mode for a savage (but playful) critique of your fridge contents
Editable ingredient list with on-the-fly recipe regeneration
Server-side API proxy keeps keys secure with client-side image compression

production.name: Sup
production.description: "Who's free to hang" PWA. One-tap broadcasting to your squad with push notifications, real-time map with midpoint calculation, and bar suggestions near the group.
highlights: Live updates via WebSockets with automatic polling fallback for reliability
Geographic database queries to calculate distances and parse location data
Calculates the geographic center point between all active users
Server-side push notifications with encrypted signing keys
Database-level access control ‚Äî users only see their own squad's data

production.name: MJ Growth Consulting
production.description: Marketing website for a Fortune 100 sales executive's growth advisory practice. Clean, minimal design with image carousel and contact form.
highlights: Swipe-enabled image carousel with touch gesture detection
Scroll-triggered fade-in animations using Intersection Observer
Dynamic schedule that auto-labels the next upcoming event
Contact form with real-time validation and API submission
Performance-optimized font loading that doesn't block page render

production.name: Horizon Alliance
production.description: Alliance hub for Last War: Survival Game. Features event schedules, battle strategies, leadership roster, and alliance lore with a tactical military aesthetic.
highlights: Live countdown timer that converts between user's timezone and game time
Structured data model for multi-phase battle plans with role assignments
Animated mobile menu with 3D transform transitions
Collapsible FAQ and lore sections with custom expand/collapse styling
Pulsing glow animations on event banners to draw attention

experimental.name: FAA Bird Strikes: Predicting Aircraft Damage
experimental.description: End-to-end data science project analyzing 316,823 wildlife-aircraft collisions from 1990-2024. Built 3 ML models (Logistic Regression, Random Forest, XGBoost) to predict aircraft damage, diagnosed and fixed overfitting, and validated with cross-validation.
highlights: Models revealed animal size (58%), aircraft mass (11%), and altitude (8%) as the top 3 damage drivers ‚Äî lighter GA planes hitting large birds are 10x more vulnerable than commercial jets
Pilot warnings barely reduce damage ‚Äî warned vs. unwarned strike outcomes are nearly identical, suggesting strikes happen too fast to mitigate
Strikes grew 8.5x per 10K flights even after normalizing for volume ‚Äî not just more planes, but recovering bird populations and stricter reporting mandates
Caught a 20% overfitting gap in Random Forest ‚Äî 3 hyperparameter constraints turned the worst model (77.5% AUC) into the best (87.8% AUC)

experimental.name: Shakespeare Transformer: Training from Scratch
experimental.description: Built a 10.8M parameter transformer from raw PyTorch ‚Äî same architecture as GPT/Claude. Trained on Shakespeare using an H100 GPU, generating 7 visualizations that reveal how the model learns language.

images.caption: Training loss dropping from random guessing to coherent Shakespeare
Model predicts next character with 98.8% confidence

highlights: Loss dropped from 4.3 (random guessing) to 1.07 in 5,000 training steps on an H100 GPU
Attention heads self-organized: early layers learn spelling, deep layers learn grammar
Model predicts 'wherefore art thou R‚Üío' with 98.8% confidence ‚Äî learned Shakespeare's patterns
Embedding space reveals the model discovered letter categories (vowels, consonants, punctuation) on its own

experimental.name: AlphaGenome: Eye Color Variant Analysis
experimental.description: Investigated how a single DNA mutation determines blue vs brown eye color using DeepMind's AlphaGenome API. Designed controlled experiments proving the model reads DNA sequence rather than memorizing results.

images.caption: 4 experiments proving the model reads DNA sequence
RNA-seq: blue vs brown eye alleles

highlights: Variant scoring identified OCA2 as the top affected gene ‚Äî matching decades of lab research
Cross-tissue analysis confirmed the effect is strongest in melanocytes (pigment cells)
Scrambled DNA test proved the model reads sequence, not coordinates (correlation: -0.03)
Histone ChIP-seq revealed a 16x enhancer activity difference between alleles

experimental.name: ATC Radar Game
experimental.description: Air Traffic Control radar simulation game. Vector arrivals to runways, sequence departures, and manage waypoints to keep the skies safe.

images.caption: Radar scope with arrivals, departures, and waypoints

highlights: Frame-rate-independent game loop ‚Äî physics work the same at 30fps or 120fps
Aircraft with 6 flight states and realistic turn/climb behavior
Enforces real ATC separation rules in both horizontal and vertical dimensions
Animated radar sweep rendered with Canvas gradients

experimental.name: News Tracker
experimental.description: Real-time news aggregator tracking latest articles for Adobe, Coal Energy, and GLP-1s with smart ranking and auto-refresh.

images.caption: Real-time article feed with smart ranking

highlights: Custom ranking algorithm that weighs article freshness and source credibility
Server-side proxy to keep API keys secure and bypass browser restrictions
Boolean search queries (AND/OR) for precise topic matching
15-minute auto-refresh with proper memory cleanup on unmount

experimental.name: New Year's Countdown 2027
experimental.description: Real-time countdown to New Year's Day with year progress tracker and particle visualization system.
highlights: Particle system where elements physically stack on top of each other
Scales from 0 to 4,500 particles proportional to year progress
Layered glass-blur effects with dynamic color-shifting glow
Choreographed entrance animations with staggered timing

experimental.name: Sports Scores
experimental.description: Live sports scores and game tracking across 17 leagues with intelligent ranking.
highlights: Fetches scores from 17 leagues simultaneously using parallel API calls
Ranks games by importance: playoff status, broadcast, team quality, and context
Caps games per league so no single sport dominates the feed
Shows today's games, or falls back to yesterday if nothing's on

experimental.name: Jackson Hole Snow Tracker
experimental.description: Real-time snow conditions dashboard with vintage split-flap display leaderboard and dynamic snowfall visualization.

images.caption: Live snow conditions with split-flap display

highlights: Snowfall animation intensity scales with actual reported snow data
Vintage airport-style split-flap display with 3D flip animations
Scrapes 12 resort websites for live snow data with automatic error recovery
Custom-drawn charts (no charting library) with dynamic axis scaling

roadmap.name: Train a Shakespeare Transformer from Scratch
roadmap.description: 10.8M parameter transformer in raw PyTorch, trained on H100 via Modal

roadmap.name: FAA Bird Strikes: Predicting Aircraft Damage
roadmap.description: 316K wildlife strikes ‚Äî EDA, 3 classifiers, overfitting diagnosis, cross-validation. Full DS pipeline from raw data to interactive dashboard.

roadmap.name: Fine-Tune an Open-Source LLM
roadmap.description: LoRA/QLoRA fine-tuning on Llama or Mistral with custom data

roadmap.name: Build Backpropagation from Scratch
roadmap.description: Pure NumPy neural net ‚Äî no autograd, every gradient written by hand

roadmap.name: Mechanistic Interpretability
roadmap.description: Reverse-engineer what specific neurons and circuits learn inside a trained transformer

roadmap.name: RLHF / DPO Alignment
roadmap.description: Train a small model to follow human preferences ‚Äî the step that turns a predictor into an assistant

roadmap.name: Build a Diffusion Model from Scratch
roadmap.description: Train a denoiser on images, visualize the full denoising process step by step

roadmap.name: NBA Player Value Analysis
roadmap.description: Feature engineering on player stats and salary data to find the most over/underpaid players. EDA, regression, clustering, and visualization storytelling.

roadmap.name: Flight Delay Prediction (BTS On-Time Data)
roadmap.description: Millions of domestic flights ‚Äî predict delays using carrier, route, time, and weather features. Full DS pipeline: cleaning, EDA, feature engineering, model comparison.
